articles.title: Postponed Brazil-Argentina game crazy: Infantino
articles.description: Football News - Fifa has opened an investigation into the postponement of Argentina's World Cup qualifier with Brazil with their president Gianni Infantino labelling the events "crazy", while Tottenham Hotspur were reported to be ready to take disciplinary action against their Argentinian... Read more at www.tnp.sg
articles.content:
Argentina's Lionel Messi (left) and Brazil's Neymar look confused as Brazilian health authorities stop their World Cup qualifier. PHOTO: AFP

articles.description: SAO PAULO (AP) — Four Argentina footballers are being investigated by Brazil federal...
articles.content:
SAO PAULO (AP) — Four Argentina footballers are being investigated by Brazil federal police for allegedly providing false information upon arrival in Sao Paulo for a World Cup qualifying match.

articles.title: Argentina confirm release of Giovani Lo Celso and Cristian Romero to Tottenham, via ten days in Croatia
articles.description: Tottenham duo Giovani Lo Celso and Cristian Romero have been released by Argentina in order to return to their club, via a 10-day stay in Croatia.

articles.title: Brazilian police investigate Argentina’s four Premier League players

articles.title: Brazil vs Argentina: Tottenham set to fine Giovani Lo Celso and Cristian Romero after defying club orders
articles.description: Giovani Lo Celso and Cristian Romero both took part in Argentinas controversial clash with Brazil that was suspended on Sunday; the pair defied club orders to join up with their national team and will be fined; both, along with Emiliano Martinez and Emiliano Buendia, will train in Croatia

articles.title: Brazil vs Argentina: Emiliano Martinez and Emiliano Buendia returning to Europe to quarantine in Croatia

articles.content:
